title: Russia's economy battles fresh U.S. sanctions
text:
Russia's economy battles fresh U.S. sanctions 6:56pm BST - 01:59 
An escalation in U.S. sanctions against Moscow risks derailing a fragile recovery in Russia's economy, which had just begun to take hold after the Kremlin's last confrontation with the West in 2014, analysts and investors said.   
An escalation in U.S. sanctions against Moscow risks derailing a fragile recovery in Russia's economy, which had just begun to take hold after the Kremlin's last confrontation with the West in 2014, analysts and investors said.  //reut.rs/2qo3jEi
